title: Case question
content:
In a business card, to write a company's tagline in english, should I use title case or sentence case?   
   
Thanks!   
Em
author: emilie

comments.content: Emillie, without looking into it too deeply, I would set the tagline in sentence case if the tagline is a sentence (e.g. It's the real thing.) If it's a fragment of a sentence or a clever combination of words that makes a phrase, I would set it both ways and see which looks more appropriate (though truthfully I can't think of a single instance of this right now).
